name: Happy Soccer
description:
Play soccer with the ball, have fun playing the most entertaining game of the moment.

The game begins with a pass to the main player of your team, this player has to search among the players who are in front and select which of them is part of their team.

If you make a mistake, you will lose a lives, otherwise you will advance on the field.

The game has attractive graphics, really good animations and a set of things that will make you spend a good time.

Game of touches, passes and soccer.
